Translations.Text: Ebam niscita'i eta muminadera jan'ye hedayeta o rahamata.
Apanara palanakarta nija sasanaksamata anuyayi tadera madhye phayasala kare debena. Tini parakramasali, subijna.
Ata'eba, apani allahara upara bharasa karuna. Niscaya apani satya o spasta pathe achena.
Apani ahabana sonate parabena na mrtaderake ebam badhirake'o naya, yakhana tara prstha pradarsana kare cale yaya.
Apani andhaderake tadera pathabhrastata theke phiriye satpathe anate parabena na. Apani kebala taderake sonate parabena, yara amara ayatasamuhe bisbasa kare. Ata'eba, tara'i ajnabaha.

Yakhana pratisruti (keyamata) samagata habe, takhana ami tadera samane bhugarbha theke ekati jiba nirgata karaba. Se manusera sathe katha balabe. E karane ye manusa amara nidarsanasamuhe bisbasa karata na.
Yedina ami ekatrita karaba ekekati dalake sesaba sampradaya theke, yara amara ayatasamuhake mithya balata; atahpara taderake bibhinna dale bibhakta kara habe.
Yakhana tara upasthita haye yabe, takhana allaha balabena, tomara ki amara ayatasamuhake mithya balechile? Athaca egulo samparke tomadera purna jnana chila na. Na tomara an'ya kichu karachile
julumera karane tadera kache ayabera oyada ese geche. Ekhana tara kona kichu balate parabe na.
Tara ki dekhe na ye, ami ratri srsti karechi tadera bisramera jan'ye ebam dinake karechi alokamaya. Niscaya ete imanadara sampradayera jan'ye nidarsanabali rayeche.

Yedina singaya phutkara de'oya habe, atahpara allaha yaderake iccha karabena, tara byatita nabhomandale o bhumandale yara ache, tara saba'i bhitabihbala haye parabe ebam sakale'i tamra kache asabe binita abasthaya.

Tumi parbatamalake dekhe acala mane kara, athaca sedina egulo meghamalara mata calamana habe. Eta allahara karigari, yini sabakichuke karechena susanhata. Tomara ya kichu karacha, tini ta abagata achena.
